meanings.definition: Very small or tiny in size.
meanings.sent1: The teeniest flower bloomed in the garden.
meanings.sent2: She picked the teeniest strawberry from the bush.
meanings.sent3: The teeniest puppy tried to bark like a big dog.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the teeniest whisper in the noisy room.
meanings.sent5: The teeniest star twinkled in the vast night sky.

meanings.definition: Smallest in size among a group.
meanings.sent1: Among the apples, the teeniest one was chosen.
meanings.sent2: The teeniest kitten in the litter was playful.
meanings.sent3: The teeniest cookie disappeared first from the plate.
meanings.sent4: His car was the teeniest in the parking lot.
meanings.sent5: The teeniest house on the street had a colorful door.

meanings.sent1: The teeniest grain of sand sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She wore the teeniest earrings that glimmered.
meanings.sent3: The teeniest button on the remote control got lost.
meanings.sent4: His handwriting was the teeniest she had ever seen.
meanings.sent5: The teeniest raindrop landed softly on her cheek.
